website_summaries.verdict: There are lots of L.O.L Surprises! in this kit to keep your child entertained for hours.
pros: Contains more than 60 accessories, making it a good choice for youngsters who love L.O.L Surprise!
cons: Some parents wish it contained more than two dolls, especially considering the higher price

customer_reviews.title: LOL - Joke's on YOU
customer_reviews.text: This is absurd. This is dime (possibly quarter) machine crap stuffed into lots of plastic packaging. My daughter wanted this because YouTube markets this garbage to her constantly... pressuring her (and all little girls) to feel like they "must" have it. I am NOT "LOL-ing."
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: My 8 year old granddaughter LOVES it
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter has a lot of L.O.L. dolls and she says this is great. She wanted to give it 10 stars. It has 2 big sisters, 1 little sister , 1 pet, 2 hats, 6 outfits, 6 pairs of shoes and 18 wigs. She loves the wigs. 6 are like real hair and 12 hairwraps that go on like a helmet. The pet comes with an outfit too. The container itself they came in will store a whole lot of dolls and clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy B

customer_reviews.title: The Fun is in the unwrapping and quantity!
customer_reviews.text: The toy of the moment is always going to be a little more expensive than what "it's worth" but like a lot of your daughter's, mine is an L.O.L. fan and loves the Idea of unboxing, looking at each surprise, unwrapping more and more. Here it's about quantity and size. She carries her Big Surprise Ball from last year with some of her dolls inside and I'm sure we'll use this one the same way. I love the sparkly pink (and durable) plastic case; makes picking all the tiny pieces and storing them easier. All in all Well worth getting them something so thrilling to unwrap.
customer_reviews.author: Darla

customer_reviews.title: Bad Deal
customer_reviews.text: Came with 2 identical dolls and only received 3 out of the 4 shoes for pet. I would not recommend this to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Big Sister!
customer_reviews.text: Really traumatized my little girls to open up their doll, only to find it with a torn mouth!!!! You must improve quality control for the sake of the children. This is unacceptable. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Carrillo

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed with this purchase. My daughter loves these.. So we got her this for Christmas. When opening.. she found the paint messed up on the dolls, 2 of the wigs we're all matted and one of the little sisters legs looked melted, giving a disformed look. She was so bothered by everything within this bigger surprise that she didn't even finish opening the pets and done accessories. Also, for the money that this thing costs.. It is not worth it. You get so many accessories and only 4 dolls (1 big sister, 2 little sister and 1 pet).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: After reading many reviews throughout the web and watch videos. I decided this is way to expensive. I ordered my daughter a bunch of different dolls. She got more dolls/pets/lil sister with outfits at a cheaper price. And the reveal was exciting every time and doubles.
customer_reviews.author: Ligas Family

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not worth it AT ALL. I don’t know what they were thinking with those rubber masks, but it was a huge disappointment! Just buy the balls instead!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Daughter was sorely disappointed to find out there was 1 full size LOL doll in this entire $100 kit, and about 20 wigs.. some made of rubber that weren’t even completely punched out of the mold. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: KylahhMonster

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This toy is so cute! It’s a Christmas gift, but I can totally guarantee the little one will love it!! Yes, a little pricey but worth it in my opinion! It comes with 2 LOL dolls, 1 pet, and 1 lil sister....and TONS of accessories!! The case is huge, definitely can be re-used for various odds and ends. But I love the concept of the LOL dolls and the way their names have to be figured out, and this is no different! It will definitely be a hit for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Erica H

customer_reviews.title: Rip off, not a surprise when both kids get the same things
customer_reviews.text: My girls absolutely love these, they got them for Christmas. We opened them up early and both big surprises are EXACTLY the same. Every single item every doll is the same. I thought they were supposed to be varied? I’m not too happy with this, for the price and the “surprise” we shouldn’t have two of the same items.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Andreasen

customer_reviews.title: Lots and Lots of Hair Styling Options
customer_reviews.text: My nieces Love the oodles of choices to customize playtime. Their mom is experiencing hair loss as she is undergoing chemotherapy. These dolls help them to experience playing with wigs and hair cover options alongside of their Mom who is exploring wigs, headbands and beanies.
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: Mine weren't well made
customer_reviews.text: Besides the fact that it creates a lot of trash. A few of the dolls were badly made, in my opinion. For how expensive they are, I don't think I should be able to see the glue that holds the head together. And the paint/color on the dolls, such as hair, eyes and clothes should be where they were meant to be, and not smeared on other parts. My daughter has more lol's like the pearl, little treasure, and all those are well made. These unfortunate were not. However, the wigs are super cute!!
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this purchase! Bigger then expected, can't wait for my daughter to open it on Christmas morning. Will update then. Thank you. UPDATE.....came with every single piece. Also came with two big sisters one little sister and a pet. The two big sisters were two different dolls and the little sister matched one of the big sisters which was fine. Overall I'm very happy with my purchase and my daughter loves it thank you so much Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Lymaris Burgos

customer_reviews.title: Wish I looked at reviews first
customer_reviews.text: I did not know it is the same set. This is our second one. I bought one 2 months ago at (walmart), then ordered another one for xmas off of (Amazon). Everything is the same from the first one.... exactly the same. I thought it would be different dolls, wigs, and accessories. NOPE... everything was the same. So I spent $95, to have my 5 year old get duplicates. Such a waist of money. Not to mention a bummed out little girl! Should be in description only one kind.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: L.O.L. Bigger Surprise
customer_reviews.text: This item was purchased as a Christmas Gift for my daughter. This was on her wish list and I am sure she is just going to love it. Shipping was fast and the item was shipped with care!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Shouldn't have bought presale
customer_reviews.text: Bummed that I paid $89 for presale and cant return it and now its $69. They need to allow for price adjustments!
customer_reviews.author: shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: If it's anything like previous LOL's I know it will be a great ...
customer_reviews.text: A Christmas gift so hasn't been opened yet. If it's anything like previous LOL's I know it will be a great surprise for my granddaughter on Christmas morning. Package arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't heistate Buy It NOW!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughters birthday instead of Christmas and she went bananas she was soooooo excited when she opened it! Yes there are a lot of little pieces and the excitement stems from opening all those blind bags!!! Now I have to top that for Christmas, but over all I gave it five stars it came quickly not damage nothing missing or open it was perfect!!!! So thankful that this made my daughter's birthday !!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: duplicates
customer_reviews.text: Just like last year with the gold LOL surprise ball, this one is just another scheme. There is only one version of this item. If your child gets more than one, they are duplicates. My granddaughter got two for Christmas, and they were exactly the same. I decided not to give her this one because then she would have three of the same. I bought it early for Christmas, and now I find that I cannot return it because the return window has closed. So sick of LOL. I can't wait till she outgrows this item.
customer_reviews.author: jdixon

customer_reviews.title: Great item for LOL fans
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t sure if it would be worth the money or if all the parts would be there based on other reviews but my daughter loved it. Everything was included, 2 big dolls, 1 little sis, 1 pet, tons of accessories and a bunch of adorable wigs. Plus now she has a carrying case to put all of her other dolls in. I did get it when it was on sale, plus I had a credit so I paid $65 for it. I don’t know if it’d be worth $90 but for what I paid I’m happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: tarrah

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Preordered this for my daughter birthday It’s going to be a great gift it’s nice & heavy & she will def put her other lol things in it once she opens it up!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for my twin nieces for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Snagged this off from Amazon last week since LOL's are IN right now and it's all my nieces can talk about. They have the other round cases so I decided to get this one for Christmas. I don't know if this will be the toy of the year but I know it will be for them. Just this weekend I bought the smaller cases at Best Buy for their birthday and it was fun to unbox it with them so I know this will take longer and they will love it for sure. I just hope that by next year we are done with the LOL fever.
customer_reviews.author: otivirics

customer_reviews.title: The product is defective and poor quality. It looks not original
customer_reviews.text: I bougth it in january, the product was delivered to my mailbox in miami. A friend brought it to me to Argentina for.my daughter birthday. She happily opened the package last week and we found that the lol.container did not close at all. So the lols fall off.of it and my doughter can not carry them.in it as we thought ir order to what was explained in the item description. Now we are in Argentina and very sad because we cannot use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great for the value
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical to order this toy because many people complaint about not too many things in it and a lot of plastic. I do agree with the plastic amount, is a little bit too much, I will rather to have way less plastic in this toy. Nonetheless, I do like the toy itself. It comes with dolls that are rare and full of accessories. Wigs are the most beautiful accessory but only works with some dolls, no exchangeable with many. Is a trendy toy that my kids love and this keeps them really busy for a long while. I do recommend it for lol addicts
customer_reviews.author: Comu

customer_reviews.title: Scam!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these super early because I didn't want to miss out and not have them for Christmas. I purchased 2 and my dad purchased 2. This is very misleading because they are all the same. It does not state in the description that every single one is the same unlike the other lol surprise dolls where you get a random one every time! I feel ripped off! My girls had fun opening up the first one but the 3 after they were extremely disappointed! IT SHOULD SAY IN THE DESCRIPTION THAT THEY ARE ALL THE SAME! TOTAL SCAM! IF YOU GET IT DONT BUY MULTIPLES!
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Bates

customer_reviews.title: The most fun and variety of all the LOL dolls!
customer_reviews.text: For those parents trying to figure out the world of LOL dolls, this is a great pack for you to get! The fun is in the opening as well as the amazing assortment of dolls, clothes, shoes, accessories, wigs, bottles, etc you receive. We purchased this for my daughter for Christmas and she loved every second of opening and continues to play with the dolls. Some change color in water which is definitely one of our favorites. Out of all the lol sets, our daughter had the most fun with opening each layer of this kit!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: A LOT of packaging.
customer_reviews.text: I’ll admit I don’t understand this lol stuff. I bought this for Christmas for my daughter. It’s so much packaging and wrapping for every little minute accessory or toy. The dolls come in unnecessary plastic containers. Every little thing comes in it’s own little plastic wrap. Watching her open it I felt like I was single handedly contributing to the need for a new landfill. Yes kids like to open things and I guess that’s supposed to be the fun of it? But it was overshadowed by my guilt watching all this random unnecessary packing go into our trash bag.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bouchard

customer_reviews.title: Suprise- it’s a box of junk!
customer_reviews.text: So Disappointed. What are the chances that you order 2 Lol Suprise boxes at 2 separate times, both from Amazon, and they are exactly the same thing? Same dolls, same outfits, same animal, same lil sister. What a waste of $160!!! Further, there is no way to know what your going to get so we were putting a lot of trust into our daughters live of LOL! Honestly, there may be 60 surprises but if we knew what was in it, I wouldn’t have paid $80 for it. Not worth it at all.
customer_reviews.author: James Womack

customer_reviews.title: If they love LOL Surprise Dolls, they will love this!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our daughter's 4th birthday and it didn't disappoint! It comes in a really nice case (that turns into an excellent place to store the dolls and accessories afterwards). It comes with 2 really cute big sisters, 1 little sister, and a pet and TONS of accessories! Our daughter absolutely loved it and it is defiantly worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Waid

customer_reviews.title: It's all about the kids reactions, not the product :-(
customer_reviews.text: I'll update once my daughters open it for Christmas.... All I can say is that the package seems to be about the same size as last years Big Surprize. In my opinion, not worth the money, but this is what they want. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany David

customer_reviews.title: Lots of stuff
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 6 year old granddaughter who has several of these dolls. I don't quite get it, but there are a lot of dolls and things and codes to figure out and she really loves them. She can spend a lot of time playing with them. Her twin brother was curious and wanted her to share some of them so we also got him a set. He spends less time, but does seem to enjoy them as well. Bear in mind, you will find tiny parts of it around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Carol H.

customer_reviews.title: Expected Better
customer_reviews.text: This was on our daughter’s wish list for the longest time. We caved and bought it for her for Christmas. She was bummed to discover only four dolls. The rest, in her words, were “junky surprises”. Entertained her for an hour at most, majority of which was spent unwrapping, only to end in disappointment. Seeing what was included, would consider it dollar store variety. Definitely not worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: WyoChick

customer_reviews.title: I know the kids like to open these, but there is so much plastic waste from these toys!
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter thoroughly enjoyed opening all the little balls, plastic wrap, plastic packages. You end up with a fairly small pile of dolls, clothes and accessories. Very expensive for what you get. The worst part is that you have no idea which dolls are included, so you can buy multiple packs and still get the same dolls. Great for little kids, horrible for planet earth!
customer_reviews.author: NPR MANTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: LOL not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandaughter for Christmas - read that it was to be one of the most wanted Christmas Gifts for 6-7 year olds, Very small pieces, the clothing, the hair wigs, outfits are nothing short of JUNK. Paid a lot of money for this item and think my grandaughter was also very disappointed. Would not recommend for any child. Would return it and get her a better gift but all the junk pieces are opened not and not sure about refunding.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Return bar gone why why
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I’m getting one star is because the fact that the return bar is gone and these are all Christmas gift should I not give them away what am I to do I’m stuck with them that’s not right because there an open undamaged 30 is there
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Can't believe I purchased this
customer_reviews.text: My niece wanted this. So I bought it. There were so many small packages. Each package was so hard to open. We spent so much time trying to get all the pieces out. I think the best part of this item was the little case. Whether or not she'll play with this item ..i don't know. But I do know I'm sorry I bought this. Can't believe I spent $75 on it. Like i said.... i think the most fun was spent opening the tons of small.packages. This item makes me not like shopping on-line....very disappointed. I don't like throwing my money away
customer_reviews.author: Aunt

customer_reviews.title: No surprise
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these, one for each of my girls, hoping they each have different dolls and surprises. The case came with two same of the same dolls and to make matters worse, both girls lol pod/case was exactly the same. So now they have 4 of the same dolls and duplicate accessories. Definitely not worth the price. These were their gifts from Santa so they were both bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Asianflwer

customer_reviews.title: Pricey
customer_reviews.text: My daughter saved her birthday money to get this. She loves it, but I was disappointed that the little sister had a hole and the pet was missing an ear. I feel like for the price the quality should be on point and it wasn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money for granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: This was for 5 yr oldgranddaughter for Christmas...she LOVED it, was her favorite gift she said. She loved finding out what each item was..I think it's all the element of surprise with the toys these days. She seems pleased with most of it, loved the wigs. She was disappointed with the outfits not fitting right..myself and her parents did not like the family sticker included in the top of case was what you find unwrapping, blew the surprise of the dolls. We also did not like the images portrayed from the clothing being short outfits covered in glitter...poor clothing choices even for dolls. Inappropriate!
customer_reviews.author: PhillyBrat05

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loved with one flaw
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVED this; only problem is it came without the spy glass. This caused a few tears on Christmas morning as she wanted to read the labels. Other than that, it was a great toy and she still plays with it daily!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Not enough variety
customer_reviews.text: There were a lot of accessories but most of them were wigs for the dolls. Like 20 or 30 wigs which was way too many! That was half of the accessories included, if not more! There were 3 adorable dolls (2 big sisters and 1 little sister) and one pet. The dolls were great but the accessories needed a lot more variety. For that reason I would not recommend this product. They need to take out at least half of the wigs and replace them with other accessories. Then it would be awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Danny

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved it, but I thought it was over priced!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter begged for LOL for Christmas, so I gave in and got this for her. She loved it and it kept her entertained for a while. There were lots of little surprises within the big container and she loved opening them all. My biggest complaint is that it was expensive for what it was. After she opened everything, she played with them a few times, but then lost interest.
customer_reviews.author: Paula in Nashville

customer_reviews.title: Only 1 type exists, so don't buy two
customer_reviews.text: Bought my daughter 1 for Christmas and she loved it, so I bought another a few months later for her Birthday and it was exactly the same! I thought it was a fluke / bad luck to get the same type twice. NOPE! THEY ONLY MAKE 1 VERSION OF THIS!! I Contacted the company and was told this... TOTALY DECEPTIVE MARKETING. All their $15 dolls have dozens of variations but the $80 one only has one type and you won't figure that out until you buy 2!
customer_reviews.author: K. A Bloom

customer_reviews.title: What a waste...on several levels
customer_reviews.text: The biggest surprise in LOL Surprise is how much of your money was just spent on packaging! This is a large plastic container that actually contains very little in the way of toy value. I’ll never buy another. We got it for our granddaughter so we would never return it, but I would never spend money on this product line again. A complete waste of money that has the added feature of adding a lot to the landfill.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha K Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Kids like it, but not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This toy is a double edged sword. Does my daughter play with it every single day? Yes! Is it worth the money? Absolutely not! A bunch of cheesy, cheap wigs, some little tiny plastic hats and sunglasses, and a little doll is definitely not worth that amount of money. I thought Barbie stuff was expensive, but at least there’s quality there! Not so with this toy. But I guess if my daughter loves it and plays with it all the time, that makes it somewhat worth it? I don’t know.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Fun for little kids but way overpriced for what you get
customer_reviews.text: My honest opinion on this is that it's not worth the money but that's my opinion as an adult. If you ask my four-year-old she would say it's great. I believe I paid somewhere upwards of $80 and after you go through all the fancy opening and get down to the product it's just a couple of small dolls with lots of little wigs and clothes and things to try on. I definitely do not see the value in this doll but then again I'm not the one playing with it? Feel like they spent more money on the packaging than they did the product.
customer_reviews.author: Kmatlock

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product was an enormously disappointing! There was NO surprise to it. I perchased two Bigger Surprise, one for each of my daughters. I figured each one was different like the other lol products. Not only were both exactly alike my girls already knew everything that was inside from utub. Save your money or buy a different product. I wish I could return and get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Rose

customer_reviews.title: Fun but not wrapped properly
customer_reviews.text: 7 year old received it for Xmas. Loved it, plays well with the toys. Unwrapping was NOT easy, most of the perforations were not complete and it made unwrapping the toys extremely difficult. 1 star removed for that and the fact that there is literal sand in the bottom of the pets bed as a "litter box" and has to be emptied in order to find the final pairs of shoes. However she enjoyed it immensely, even with the frustrating packaging.
customer_reviews.author: kasey palmer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for Christmas. It seems that the quality is not what the quality has been for other LOL Surprise products. The clothes and wigs don't fit well and some of the dolls seem dirty. Makes me wonder if this may be a knockoff because the dolls and accessories feel differently than the ones we bought at the store. Daughter is a bit disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Oskitini

customer_reviews.title: It was a hit: "Oh my gosh! I've wanted this all my life!"
customer_reviews.text: My 5-year-old niece gasped in sheer delight when she saw the pink tub on Christmas morning and declared she had wanted one "all my life!" She immediately tore into it and didn't even open the other three presents around her, she was so focused on making her way through the items in the tub. I can't say I'd recommend this at full price, but it definitely made an impact! She said she loved it, and that's what's most important to me.
customer_reviews.author: jmonique

customer_reviews.title: best toy ever
customer_reviews.text: got this for my granddaughter for Christmas. every single item in this case is individually wrapped. yes all 60+ items. I'd say it took a good half hour or more to open the whole thing as she had to keep stopping to sort everything out and maybe play for a second or two. her brother even got in on it also, he is 9 and she is 7 so don't thing that only the girls enjoy unwrapping all this stuff. they had the best time.
customer_reviews.author: Jacki

customer_reviews.title: So cute and girly!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these, one for my daughter and one for my step daughter for Christmas and I am so excited for them to open them as they are HUGE LOL doll fans!! We’ve also purchased 2 of the LOL doll houses, box is SUUPER heavy so thinking it is going to be good quality and keep both of our 8yr olds busy for awhile!!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Over Rated
customer_reviews.text: Most of the items inside were superfluous junk like rubber molds that somehow wrap around the head of the dolls but seem totally pointless and a cheap way to fill the container with extra things. My 4yr old extracted about 15 item which she kept in her LOL collection and the rest were thrown out.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Mackay

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but great if they love LOL’S
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a lover of these types of toys but our soon to be 7 year old had asked for lol dolls for her birthday and she barely asks for anything. We had a hard time finding it in stores so ordered it from here not sure if you can get them cheaper else where? What I can tell you is if your child is into this kind of thing then go for it.. she loved going through all the packages.
customer_reviews.author: SamBrit

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: This is a humongous collection of individually wrapped tiny items whose sole purpose is to extract money from parents succumbing to the requests of children that will spend a total of 38 minutes unwrapping each individual piece before abandoning the collection due to its impracticality. Imagine a Barbie collection shrunk to fit in acereal box and each piece being individually wrapped to give the appearance of overall worth...
customer_reviews.author: Mike B.

customer_reviews.title: The same exact lol dolls in this type of package from this seller
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money if you only want to buy one set. However, I purchased one and my mom purchased one from them not knowing that each set is identical. The little girl opened the two sets and they have the same exact dolls and accessories. It was a let down. The whole thing about the lol dolls is to have a SURPRISE inside of the packages.
customer_reviews.author: Emromex

customer_reviews.title: Tons of plastic for such little toys
customer_reviews.text: I as a parent and as a person hate this toy, lots and lots and too much plastic involves the tiny toys, if you are not familiar with this toy like I was it was definitely a surprise but not an lol. Too much unwrapping, then it comes with more plastic containers. Not the sellers fault though. You get what you expect from the brand L.O.L. and that's it! Other than that shipping was good and everything as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Crissy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing Purchase. Avoid this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty disappointing with the quality of items included. Absolutely not worth $80. Over priced accessory kit is what this should be called. My daughter opened hers on Christmas has about 75% accessories/wigs and 25% dolls. If I knew it was mainly an accessory kit I would've never purchased. The only part that my daughter actually can use is the case. Avoid buying this, you will be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Lol
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my niece's birthday because she is obsessed with LOL surprise. There is not value for money because these things unnecessarily expensive. They are very giftable she loves them and I felt like the best aunt in the world. However, now she wants the huge hundred dollar van so I may have created a monster.
customer_reviews.author: Vivy

customer_reviews.title: These are truly ridiculous but OH SO MUCH FUN to open!
customer_reviews.text: My word, whomever invented these toys is a marketing genius. It's all about the unveiling. Takes a good bit of time to unwrap each layers so the kids had a blast. Then, of course, they have been playing with the "masks" and accessories. The real-life cat litter box with glitter poo-sand took us a minute to figure out what it was. LOL is a fitting name, LOL that we buy this stuff at these prices, but the kids LOVED it. I would have loved this as a kid.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Nunn

customer_reviews.title: She loved it
customer_reviews.text: As a parent, I am still not sure why this kit costs so much but my 4 year old loved it, so I guess that's all that matters. The wigs and head pieces were a big hit and quite funny in my opinion. I'm actually not even sure what other "surprises" came with it but I'm sure they are scattered all over my house somewhere. Either way, if your child is an LOL fanatic, they will love it. If you love opening 60 packages of tiny toys, then you will love it too!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Appears fine, but can’t really know until Christmas
customer_reviews.text: I honestly cannot give it a complete review as I purchased this for a Christmas gift for my granddaughter. It did arrive on time and undamaged as far as I can tell. I have heard stories of when people open it, many if not all “surprises” are missing. I hope this is not the case on Christmas morning for her. I will come back and give a further review.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Pellecchia

customer_reviews.title: Little Girls Love them... Still not sure why LOL
customer_reviews.text: I called my sister and needed to send a gift for my nieces birthday but didn't want it to be singular since I have 3... she told me anything LOL so I got the most pieces for the value... What kid doesn't like to open all those individual packages. Overall, they loved it and it gained the desired outcome - happy little nieces.
customer_reviews.author: Adam James Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: My daughter thought she really wanted one of these. I don't understand an $80 toy filled with accessories and then only gives you 2 tiny dolls and a tiny animal. It had a bunch of things that we could never figure out the purpose of. If someone you know wants an LOL, get them one of the $10 or $15 ones. This was a humongous disappointment. My 6 year old was not impressed whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra L. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Scam of a Product- Cost doesn’t Match Value.
customer_reviews.text: Scam of a product. After it is all said & done: your kid will get a couple of dolls, a couple of pets and some fillers. And a lot of garbage. Better off buying 10 lol balls, at least you’re getting a toy. Here - most of the unpack? Resulted in - stickers - wigs - some dinky clothes Really awful present: kids are conditioned to just open them and not appreciate what they get, they just move on to next unboxing. Ordered this b/c daughter kept talking it up- should have done some research. STAY AWAY FROM THIS ITEM: STAY SWAY IN GENERAL. it’s just a money suck.
customer_reviews.author: HokieNYC

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: This is the gift that keeps on giving! After opening it up on Christmas morning, my eight year old daughter kept opening and opening a little at a time. It took her almost an hour to open every compartment just to find out what was inside each one. This gave her hours of entertainment and it has been a few weeks and she is still "discovering" something new to do/play with. I was a little shocked at the price but after the hours of enjoyment, I can see why!
customer_reviews.author: K. LaNou

customer_reviews.title: Wait for a sale
customer_reviews.text: My almost 6-year-old really wanted this for Christmas. I balked at the high price, but stalked it daily waiting for a deal. Eventually one came. It was worth every penny watching her joy on Christmas morning. Now she has a great container to keep her whole LOL collection together. She really liked all the wigs. However, I thought it was weird how I had to tear apart all the rubbery wigs.
customer_reviews.author: Ohio Mom

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The box was very cute, but when my daughter opened it, all the Lols were of dark skin tone. I just expected something with more variety. It was sad to spend so much money to have the same LOL dolls in the surprise box
customer_reviews.author: vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Huge let down
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 of these for a Christmas gift as my Neice asked for 6 after giving one of the same product to her for Christmas. She is 7 years old and this was a huge deal getting 3 more for Christmas until all 3 where exactly the same thing. This is not advertised and is more then frustrating given the amount of money I have spent on these dolls. HUGE LET DOWN👎🏻
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST LOL SURPRISE EVER!!! I GIVE MILLIONS OF STARS!!#
customer_reviews.text: IT IS SO WORTH THE MONEY. MY DAUGHTER LOVES IT. EVERYTHING INSIDE IS SO BEAUTIFUL. I RECOMMEND BUYING THIS TOY. THE LOOK ON MY DAUGHTER'S FACE WHEN SHE FIRST SAW IT, "PRICELESS". IT COMES WITH 2 DOLLS, ONE LITTLE SISTER, AND ONE PET. 6 WIGS AND SO MUCH, MUCH MORE SURPRISES. 60+ SURPRISES. VERY GOOD QUALITY.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo/Patricia

customer_reviews.title: I like that it has a case to store all of ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this! I like that it has a case to store all of the dolls and accessories in it. The wigs are super cute too. She has been playing with these nonstop for about a week. The price is very high- but I will say it has made her very happy. I just wish the price was lower!!
customer_reviews.author: s

customer_reviews.title: Daughter adores this gift, parent feels guilty about all of the plastic packaging
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for her 6th birthday. She was beyond excited to get it, it was the highlight of her birthday. It took her about 30 minutes to open everything, and it was 30 minutes of pure delight. She's been playing with the toys every day since she got it (only 4 days ago). I'm glad I bought it, BUT I do have to add that *I* hate LOLs because of all the plastic packaging. There is a ridiculous amount plastic that is thrown away within 10 minutes of opening. Ridiculous amount. For this reason, I try not to buy LOLs very often, which may have made this birthday gift even more exciting for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: It's the same dolls every time...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for Christmas and my daughter absolutely loved it. Naturally, when her birthday came around this is the only thing she wanted. With all the dolls and accessories that came with the first one that I didn't see a reason not to buy it again. My daughter was ecstatic when she unwrapped her present. Her joy quickly turned to frustration as she unwrapped each doll only to discover they were the exact same dolls from Christmas. For a product built around randomness and surprise I was very disappointed to find out their big surprise isn't random at all. Buyer beware, this should only be a one time purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Wilhelm

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has not opened it yet as it’s a Christmas gift. This review is based on price. I should have waited to purchase this as the price has dropped significantly since I purchased it in October. I didn’t want to be frantically searching for it as many did last year. I’m sure my daughter will love it but I can already tell you from the YouTube videos, it is not worth the price I paid. ($89.99)
customer_reviews.author: Amie

customer_reviews.title: Kids love this - but it Creates too much plastic waste- please change packaging!!
customer_reviews.text: My girls love these- so as far the toy itself- it was perfect— but for me- I think it’s a ridiculous amount of plastic trash that is generated- they should switch to biodegradable papers or tissues to wrap it all— the entire thing generates 90% plastic waste while you save 10% of the tiny toys.. that’s my only reservation. I’m an era of parents and kids giving up plastic straws and other plastics- this toy is just a giant ball of plastic trash- mostly all nonuseable wrappings..
customer_reviews.author: Stacy S.

customer_reviews.title: Ultimate LOL set
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves LOL and this was the ultimate gift. It came with so many pieces which is both a positive and a negative. Positive- get what you pay for. Lots of pieces come with the set making it worth the money. Negative- each little piece inside is individually wrapped so that means lots of garbage. The container is also a little bulky but you don’t necessarily have to keep it after purchase. Overall it’s a great purchase for your LOL lover.
customer_reviews.author: Arianna Egloff

customer_reviews.title: My 8 year-old LOVES this!
customer_reviews.text: My kids and their friends love these dolls. I think it's mostly about the packaging being a big surprise, but they do play with them as well. There are a lot of accessories and outfits available to change them into. Also, there are a lot of YouTube videos about them and my kids love the YouTube videos about un-boxing toys or playing with toys like this.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Downey

customer_reviews.title: Lots of surprises in one container
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old daughter LOVES LOL Surprise. The Bigger surprise is something she received for Christmas. She absolutely LOVED it! She had everything unwrapped within the first hour of play, but has continued to play with the dolls exchanging their accessories. The prices equates to purchasing all of these separately. My daughter unwrapped one she said was rare. As long as my daughter is happy with it, I’m happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly W

customer_reviews.title: Great toy - But such a waste
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves LOL so of course we do what we can to get her some here and there. I know one of the whole joys of the toy is unpacking it all - made popular by Youtube. But I just wish it wasn't so much plastic waste. Other than that the toys came in good shape, good quality for LOL.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced for cheap messy plastic
customer_reviews.text: High price for what feels like a collection of over packaged happy meal toys. Lots of plastic and small pieces everywhere after opening that will probably end up in landfill. Little girl lost interest quite quickly!
customer_reviews.author: shopper18

customer_reviews.title: So many surprises
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old was super excited to get this from Santa this past Christmas. Yes it is over priced for small plastic dolls and their outfits but considering that just ONE LOL doll costs about 10 bucks you actually get alot out of this bigger sized one. My little one loved all the wigs and outfits that came in this set. She really enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: sheliny

customer_reviews.title: Better the 2nd time around
customer_reviews.text: After receiving a replacement because the first one came with missing pieces I was finally able to have a brand new one . My daughter is going to be so happy for Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Dayshawn Gadson

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: OK a little over the top with this but my 4 year old loved it and I guess that,s why i got it for her. If she opened all of them she ask me can I have another one I said honey if i could I would but this is a one time thing because of the price. I would love to get them for free and write a product report on them for the company.
customer_reviews.author: mrbigshot

customer_reviews.title: Totally not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Over priced totally not worth it total disappointment in the item not what was expected for the price. Would not recommend anyone to purchase. Was such a waste and my daughter was so excited to open it up only to be so disappointed with the crap inside.
customer_reviews.author: Neila Maraj

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves LOL dolls. And begged for this. It did not disappoint. Tons of dolls and accessories. Worth it. Made a great Cmas present! Bonus points is the double joy. One from opening it up to find it. And two from the process of opening up all the surprises. Genius. This cmas her gifts were being opened all day long! Winning!
customer_reviews.author: Gina L

customer_reviews.title: Expensive for what you get, but it's worth it to see the kid so happy!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is obsessed with Lol Surprise. This was the top thing on her Christmas list. She has a few of the Glam and Bling series dolls. I can't wait for Christmas to see her open the Bigger Surprise. Yes, it is expensive and she will probably lose most of the smaller pieces by January, but it's worth it to see her so excited on Christmas morning.
customer_reviews.author: hddavis

customer_reviews.title: Kids love opening them, too expensive for 70% of it trashed
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved opening all the blind bags... however it was not worth the money for this package. Several wigs and pieces added as part of the prizes that are just not cool!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Arrived as expected
customer_reviews.text: I can't say much about LOL dolls as my daughter just got into them. I do think they keep her very busy. She has endless possibilities with the variations and the magic of opening them one buy one in this large kit was great. It kept her busy just opening for over an hour. Highly recommended for any LOL doll fans.
customer_reviews.author: Pittman214

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what any Lol Doll fan needs!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this because of how bad of reviews the last big Lol kit got, but it took my daughter a long time to open this and she never once lost interest. There are multiple smaller Lol surprises inside along with tons of accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Miller

customer_reviews.title: My daughter is very happy.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves LOLs—and even though I hate how much trash they produce via unboxing—I still got her this suitcase for her birthday. She loves it, loves the doll and accessories. And I do like how occupied it keeps her, not only with the unboxing but also afterward in play time. She’s happy so I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug

customer_reviews.title: Magic case of unending toys
customer_reviews.text: Order this for my daughter at her request. I have no clue what this is or does, and I don't know how many things were packed in there, but it seemed like she pulled out 900 little gifts one after another for about an hour. She was tickled pink and I want to know where I can get some of these magic cases that hold so much stuff
customer_reviews.author: Ron K.

customer_reviews.title: She Loved It!
customer_reviews.text: Nine-year-old girl loved opening the 60 compartments and finding the surprises. Loved that the storage unit holds it all plus more. Is not "green" with all the waste peeling off and the plastic bubbles and trays. I had a hard time paying $60 for a "mystery" gift, but glad I did. It was worth it watching her joy!
customer_reviews.author: P C

customer_reviews.title: Ummm
customer_reviews.text: I like what comes inside but is is a scam I don’t think you should buy it
customer_reviews.author: Brannon

customer_reviews.title: If you have already bought this product don’t buy it again
customer_reviews.text: If you are a fan of LOL’s. Then you have bought the LOL big surprise before. I just want everyone to know not to re-buy this product if you have already bought it in the past you’re going to get exactly what you got the first time
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Herring

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift/ Price/Dependable Delivery
customer_reviews.text: These were Christmas gifts ordered 2 for my girls. They loved them. As their Mother made plain to me how much she hated them. To her they are junk, but they weren't bought for her. Only thing they asked for so thankfully while all local stores were sold out....Amazon wasn't!! Thank you Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: SissyB

customer_reviews.title: Not match what’s described! Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this big surprise as a Christmas gift for my little daughter. When she opened it, I was waiting to see her surprise and exciting smiles at the moment she was about to discover the 18 hair styles as described in the product information. But no! No 18 hair styles besides the brashable 6 hair styles. In stead, there were 6 cheap rubber disguises which are vulnerable to be tore open. So disappointed! The misleading information is not what I expect from Amazon! Waste of money as it is!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our daughter for Christmas and she loves it! It kept her busy for quite some time having to open all the surprises. I love the outfits it came with and the wigs are so much fun. We like to dress up the dolls and this package provides some very fun and stylish outfits and hair!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Spinella

customer_reviews.title: Accessory after Accessory after Accessory
customer_reviews.text: This was literally a surprise. I didn't realize that so many pieces would come in this box. This was a hit for Christmas. I'm not a fan of the amount of trash that can accumulate when opening any LOL surprise so parent's beware! There will be lots of trash to get rid of. In addition to squeals of excitement from your kids after discovering each surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Philip

customer_reviews.title: Total enjoyment!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved this! It was the ultimate gift that just kept giving! There were many dolls and outfits. She loved it. If you are buying only one gift for a child, this is it. It took her about 45 minutes to open everything. She was enjoying every minute. Not a frenzy opening. Just over the moon with every new discovery.
customer_reviews.author: sarah lynn

product_meta.title: L.O.L. Surprise Bigger Surprise with 60+ Surprises
product_meta.description: L.O.L. Surprise dolls were on a top secret mission when their pet went missing Find surprise clues across the eye spy series to help find their pet Discover 60+ Never before seen surprises inside the L.O.L. Surprise bigger surprise with exclusive dolls and accessories
feature_bullets: L.O.L. Surprise provides the ultimate unboxing experience with the L.O.L. Surprise Bigger Surprise
Discover 60+ never before seen surprises inside with exclusive dolls and accessories

Includes: 2 limited edition L.O.L. Surprise dolls, each with 7 surprises, 1 limited edition L.O.L. Surprise pet with 7 surprises, 1 limited edition L.O.L. Surprise Lil sister with 5 surprises, 12 plastic hairstyles, 6 brush able hairstyles, 6 face masks, 10 additional accessories, spy glass, sticker L.O.L. Bigger surprise turns into a purse carrying case where you can hold lol collectible dolls; only 1 style available
Give your L.O.L. Surprise dolls multiple new looks with 18 different hair styles to choose from

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars5,567 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
